texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Since AOL sends their users' traffic through proxy servers, this can cause problems with Horde's session handling in Plesk. The problem arises when the user's IP changes during the middle of the session.
texts.text: Since AOL sends their users' traffic through proxy servers, this can cause problems with Horde's session handling in Plesk. The problem arises when the user's IP changes during the middle of the session.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You may see an error message in Horde that looks like this:
texts.text: You may see an error message in Horde that looks like this:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Your Internet Address has changed since the beginning of your Mail session. To protect your security, you must login again.
texts.text: Your Internet Address has changed since the beginning of your Mail session. To protect your security, you must login again.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You'll normally have this variable in /etc/psa-horde/horde/conf.php:
texts.text: You'll normally have this variable in /etc/psa-horde/horde/conf.php:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You can disable this ip check functionality which breaks sessions for AOL users by setting it to false:
texts.text: You can disable this ip check functionality which breaks sessions for AOL users by setting it to false:
